entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
